summary: Completed testing of AI15 financial gaming platform admin panel hardening. Backend APIs are centralized through admin.js, promo codes API correctly excludes enable/delete actions, balance control uses only load/withdraw endpoints, and feature flag for AdminAITestSpot is properly implemented.

ui_bugs.issue: Session management may have issues with token persistence across page navigation

integration_issues.issue: Initial environment configuration was missing REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL

passed_tests: Admin dashboard loads after successful login
action_item_for_main_agent: Environment configuration was missing - added REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL to frontend/.env. PostgreSQL database was not configured - installed and configured PostgreSQL with admin user. All admin API endpoints are working correctly through centralized admin.js client. Promo codes correctly exclude enable/delete actions. Balance control correctly uses only load/withdraw endpoints. Feature flag for AdminAITestSpot is properly implemented.
